sentence: There are so many people in our community who have suffered and our own family members have suffered and to us its so gratifying to honor them, said Armando Ibarra, president of Miami Young Republicans and founder of the Florida Commission of Victims of Communism.? sentence: In Florida, Governor Ron DeSantis appointed Ester Byrd, a prominent Moms for Liberty member, to Floridas Board of Education.
